name: Cooking Scramble: EXPRESS! The Widget Food Making and Notification Center Game
name_original: Cooking Scramble: EXPRESS! The Widget Food Making and Notification Center Game
description:
Now available for FREE: The World's First Cooking Widget Game! The fastest game to open and play on your phone... from bored to fun in 1 second!

Once you set the game up, there's no need to even unlock your phone to start playing... just swipe the Notification Center down and you're serving delicious meals to customers and earning coins in no time!

Play while standing in line, waiting for the bus... literally anytime you've got a few minutes to kill! Play with your friends and see who can get the high-score!

SETUP:
1. Download and install the game right now.
2. Open the App.
3. Setup the Cooking Scramble Cooking widget game from the Notification Center:
- Swipe the Notification Center down from the top of your iPhone/iPad
- Select "Today" and tap "Edit"
- Add "Cooking Scramble: EXPRESS!" to your displayed Widgets.
4. ENJOY! Get Cooking!

Come visit our Home and “Like” us on Facebook! Let us know anything you'd like to see in the next version!
https://www.facebook.com/Flowmotionentertainment
